content:
PFF Panel 1 CPF Seedly PFF 2019 Asked by @@ LimAsked on 02 Mar 2019By 65, you will have 1m. But how much can you actually get out ?
CPF will give you the 1M out in how many years? Will you be able to take out that 1M out?1 answerAnswerBump13
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

JJavierLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 02 Mar 2019You will be under CPF Life and with this $1m amount, u should have reached the Enhanced Retirement Sum. So u will have a lifetime payout of about $2k plus per month til death.0 comments0
